Get Support

If you have a question about working with RBC data, please create a topic on NeuroStars with the rbc tag. The RBC maintainers will be notified about the new post and will respond when theyâ€™re able.

If you have used RBC data for your research, and would like to share a summary of your work as a blog post on the RBC website, please open an issue on the RBC website GitHub repository, and the RBC maintainers will work with you to create the blog post.
